means: 大量存在，充满，富于( abound的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Ahead lay the scalloped ocean and the abounding blessed isles.
sentence.Network_cn: 再往前是水波荡漾的海洋和星罗棋布的宝岛.

sentence.Network_en: The metallic curve of his sheep - crook shone silver - bright in the same abounding rays.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那弯柄牧羊杖上的金属曲线也在这一片炽盛的火光下闪着银亮的光.

sentence.Network_en: Lord, Your mercy is rich and Your grace abounding.
sentence.Network_cn: 主, 你的怜悯丰厚,你的恩典洋溢.

PerfectNetExp.abs: abound 多abounding 丰富的about face 向后转
having or covered with or abounding in plumes ., 长有羽毛 , 覆盖着羽毛或者有大量的羽毛.
covered with or abounding in grass., 被草覆盖的或长满草的.
abounding in or covered with or resembling or consisting of chaff ., 有大量的糠 , 被糠覆盖 , 象糠一样或由糠组成.

list.abs: 过程思维 ... Management 管理层 Redundancies abound 资源浪费 Permanent resources 使用固定资源.
abort 异常结束aboundance ratio 丰满度about ship 掉抢
... Unit 6：Family Life 家庭生 1． Examples abound. 例子举不胜举。 2． Free time is at a premium for him. 他很少有空。.
Other examples abound , including bus bombings and assassinations ., 其他还有大量事例 , 诸如公共汽车爆炸和暗杀.
not only poetic thought and fancy abound , but the richness and variety of language and expression is also marvellous .不仅饱含着诗一般的思想和丰富的想象力，华丽多彩的语言和表达也妙不可言。

entry.def: If things abound, or if a place abounds with things, there are very large numbers of them.

example.ex: Stories abound about when he was in charge...
example.tran: 关于他在任时的传闻多不胜数。
威尼斯有许多知名的酒店。

auth_sentence.content: The Florestan Trio have these in abundance, and their performance is abounding in expression, delicacy and verve.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Florestan Trio have these in abundance, and their performance is abounding in expression, delicacy and verve.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Florestan Trio have these in abundance, and their performance is abounding in expression, delicacy and verve.
